issue.title: Compile error on OSX due to missing linux/hidraw.h header in HydraPlugin

content.raw: I don't remember doing it manually. I am guessing I've probably installed some other library that depends on it so it's there. A simple workaround would just be adding a check in plugins/CMakeList.txt to skip the hydra plugin if `APPLE` is defined.
content.html: I don't remember doing it manually. I am guessing I've probably installed some other library that depends on it so it's there. A simple workaround would just be adding a check in plugins/CMakeList.txt to skip the hydra plugin if APPLE is defined.
